pages.text: If an altar and crucibles of the same type are placed next to each other (default is a radius of 4 blocks) and the crucibles are filled with essence, enchanting rituals can take place.

Each transformable item possesses an essence cost for a successful magical transformation. If enough essence is available for this process, $(4)right-click$() on the altar with a Harken Athame to perform the ritual.$(br2)You can optionally also use JEI/HEI to see altar recipes and essence costs.
